sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <description>(Action) Once per session, the character may take the Comprehend Technology action, making an Average (two difficulty dice/purple d8) Knowledge (Education) check to intuitively understand one weapon, armor set, or other piece of personal gear. Success means that for the remainder of the encounter, when the character makes any skill checks to use or repair the item, he may count his ranks in the applicable skill as equal to his current Force rating.  For example, a character may use Comprehend Technology to count his ranks in Mechanics as equal to his Force rating when repairing a broken lightsaber, or he can count his ranks in Ranged (Light) as equal to his Force rating when firing a blaster pistol.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>true</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Comprehend technology</name> <number>TAL0001019</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-01-21 16:49:07</sys_created_on> <sys_id>bbd70628db660c542901de90cf961985</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-01-21 16:49:07</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
